title: The new M4 MacBook Air already has its first $50 discount
content:
Macworld

Apple’s new M4 MacBook Air just landed in stores this week, and we’re already seeing its first $50 discount, including the new sky blue color. This means you can get the latest MacBook Air for $949. Apple also cut the price of the base model from $1,099 to $999, so it’s like you’re saving $150.

We’ve already reviewed the MacBook Air M4 and absolutely loved it, giving it a perfect 5-star rating. In fact, our editor noted that “Apple made its best laptop better than ever,” which makes recommending the new laptop that much easier. After spending time with the new MacBook Air and running countless tests, we loved the fast performance delivered by the new chip, the camera upgrade, and the new external display support, which lets you run up to two external displays at 6K with the lid open for a total of three screens.

We found the new MacBook Air M4 to be good enough that just about anyone should upgrade, especially if you have an M2 or earlier. The power boost definitely justifies shelling out $949, so don’t miss out on this introductory deal and get that $50 off coupon at Amazon.
